constraints.name: partition
constraints.description: 将所有节点分成两个子集，每个子集再递归地分成两个子集，直到每个子集中只有一个节点
constraints.formal: P = partition(P, axis); P1, P2 = split(P, axis); recursively apply on P1 and P2

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 在每个子集中，节点必须按照某种顺序（如坐标）进行访问
constraints.formal: for each subset S: visit nodes in S in a specific order (e.g., by X or Y coordinate)

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 所有节点的X坐标和Y坐标都是唯一的
constraints.formal: ∀i, j (i ≠ j) : X_i ≠ X_j ∧ Y_i ≠ Y_j
